casebody.data:
Robert V. PENTLAND III
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Jennifer L. Bourn, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Robert V. Pentland Ill's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 779, 169 A.3d 851 (2017), is denied.
